title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 21 - Gas, Electric, Steam, Waterworks, Telegraph And Telephone Corporations And Municipalities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 21 - Gas, Electric, Steam, Waterworks, Telegraph And Telephone Corporations And Municipalities

State Regulations
§ 21.1 - Summary of legal requirements
§ 21.2 - Rules applicable to all petitions
§ 21.3 - Evidence to be presented at hearing
§ 21.4 - Certification of radio-telephone utilities
§ 21.5 - Amendments to radio-telephone utility certificates
§ 21.6 - Service changes
§ 21.7 - Certification of resellers of telephone service
§ 21.8 - Alternate service provision for resale
§ 21.9 - Filing with other governmental agencies
§ 21.10 - Expedited proceedings on noncontested applications

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 21

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§
4[1], 20, 68, 81, 94[2], 99

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
